entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 02:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -9.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
